Hints of MR in Dead or Alive 2:Hardcore!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2001 Topics (Year Of The Heart Crystal): Hints of MR in Dead or Alive 2:Hardcore!
By SCT on Sunday, April 22, 2001 - 10:37 am:

While playing Dead or Alive I found that you can collect 'false suezo' and 'suezo' as items in the survival mode. You can get them with any character.

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, April 22, 2001 - 06:49 pm:

Thanks SCT! I always wondered about 'crossovers'!

By scopedog on Monday, April 23, 2001 - 06:15 am:

Oh, Tecmo's good for that - in DOA2 Hardcore one of Ayane's secret costumes is Millenia's from Deception 2 - complete with tattoo on the back... and it's no accident that using Tecmo's Winning Post horse racing sim produces a Trotter in MR2.

By Anonymous on Monday, April 23, 2001 - 05:27 pm:

It would be cool if one of the girls in DOA2 Hardcore had a Pixie costume from the MR games.

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, April 24, 2001 - 08:36 am:

Yes, after all, they put a Pixie named Kasumi into a MR game...

By Anonymous on Tuesday, April 24, 2001 - 12:00 pm:
